short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension prevents the canvas tab or window from detecting when you’ve navigated away.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Canvas Incognito: Ultimate Privacy for Canvas

Take control of your browsing experience with Canvas Incognito, a powerful Chrome extension designed to override visibility and focus behaviors in your browser. Whether you’re multitasking or exploring content freely, Canvas Incognito ensures that your activity remains undetected by blocking intrusive tracking mechanisms.

https://sites.google.com/view/canvasincognito/home

Key Features:
Overrides Browser Visibility and Focus Behaviors: Prevent websites from detecting when you switch tabs or leave the page, ensuring uninterrupted browsing.
You will not be flagged for leaving Canvas Quizzes in the activity log.
Blocks Specific Event Listeners: Disables event listeners commonly used to monitor user activity, enhancing your privacy.
Protects Against "AI Trojan Horse" Hacks: Actively monitors the DOM to safeguard against hidden elements that could compromise your security.
Always Visible, Always Focused: Modifies visibility properties to keep the page consistently visible and focused, no matter where you navigate.
Whether you're safeguarding your privacy, bypassing invasive tracking tools, or simply multitasking during online sessions, Canvas Incognito gives you the confidence and freedom to browse securely. Install now and experience the next level of control over your browser's behavior.

Privacy First, Always:
Your data is yours alone. Canvas Incognito operates locally on your browser and does not store or transmit your information, providing peace of mind and true user control.

Ready to take charge? Add Canvas Incognito to Chrome today.
